price: តើអ្វី(ចំណីអាហារ)ដែលគេត្រៀមឱ្យ(អ្នកឋានសួគ៌) នោះល្អជាង ឬដើមហ្សឹកគូម(ដែលជាចំណីពួកនរក)ល្អជាង?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
